original_title: 897 Suspects Arrested in Operation Yukthiya Within 24 Hours
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan security forces have arrested 897 suspects within the past 24 hours as part of Operation Yukthiya.
Among the arrested individuals, detention orders were issued against 23 suspects.
Additionally, 19 drug addicts were identified and sent to rehabilitation centers for treatment and recovery.
Security forces successfully apprehended 31 suspects listed on the Police Narcotics and Special Bureau's wanted list.
Furthermore, the security forces seized a large quantity of illegal drugs during the operation.
This haul included ice, heroin, and ganja, all of which are harmful and addictive substances.
